txt.en: Miruhir has asked you to repair fences around a section of vineyard in Iáphel.\n\nThe broken fences can be found on the western hill of Iáphel.

'Recent storms have damaged sections of fence around the vineyard. Animals have taken advantage of these gaps to sneak onto the grounds and feast on the fruit. One time a sheep managed to get into the wine. I spent the next hour watching an apologetic shepherd coax the drunk critter back to the rest of the flock. As amusing as that was, it's probably for the best that it doesn't happen again.'
'Thank you. Another thing off my mind.'
TBD defeat sickle flies around the vineyard
You should tell Miruhir that you have finished repairing the fence.\n\nMiruhir can be found in Iáphel.
There are broken sections of fence in Iáphel that need mending.
TBD vintner has a sickle fly problem
